content: give me full name,last name , email  payment due amount of those customers whose payment due date fall in 2025 only those defendants

**🧠 Thought:** _**  
We need to pull the following fields for every defendant whose payment‑due date falls in 2025:  
- Full name (first + last)  
- Last name  
- Email  
- Payment‑due amount (the column that holds the amount due is `NextPaymentDueAmount` in the dataset).  

The dataset contains a `PaymentDueDate` column (not listed in the brief but mentioned in the column groups). We’ll filter on the year part of that date. All operations will be vectorised with pandas.

**_

Found 1777 records with 4 columns (FullName, LastName, Email, PaymentDueAmount):

• FullName: John Lewis | LastName: Lewis | Email: john.lewis6@emailtest.org | PaymentDueAmount: 250
